Name: Missing
About the game: This game is a mixture of room escape games and horror games, and the main background is the art academy that my girlfriend attended before she went missing. You should become the main character and take pictures of famous paintings hidden in the deserted art academy to collect evidence and get the key to the next place to collect evidence and escape from this missing case. However, you should not make eye contact with ghosts you will encounter on the way to find clues. The main character is afraid of ghosts, but he visited an art academy where he was deserted to get clues about his girlfriend's disappearance, and when he makes eye contact with the ghost, his heart rate increases and the game ends.
